attributes.action: A public inquiry into why the NHS staff were not given appropriate PPE
attributes.additional_details: Hundreds of NHS workers have lost their lives or have experienced the terrible covid-19 symptoms simply because the government made wrong policies and failed to provide them with appropriate protection. They did not have a clue about the virus so instead of being extra vigilant, they became extra lenient and forcibly made policies withholding PPE leaving them exposed to the virus. We demand that all those responsible should be given maximum Punishments so that it doesn’t happen again.
attributes.background: We demand a public inquiry into why the NHS staff was stopped from wearing face masks and other items of PPE when the covid 19 threat started, a policy that lead to deaths of so many NHS workers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Investigate NHS Supply Chain performance providing PPE to frontline staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312054

Hold a Public Inquiry into the handling of the Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
